cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: @@{centos.username}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:@@{root.secret}@@
    @@{centos.username}@@:@@{centos.secret}@@
  expire: False
write_files: 
- content: |
    search @@{domain}@@
    nameserver @@{dns1}@@
  path: /etc/resolv.conf
runcmd:
  - [nmcli, connection, reload]
  - [systemctl, mask, cloud-init-local, cloud-init, cloud-config, cloud-final]
  - [eject]

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: @@{centos.username}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:@@{root.secret}@@
    @@{centos.username}@@:@@{centos.secret}@@
  expire: False
write_files: 
- content: |
    search @@{domain}@@
    nameserver @@{dns1}@@
  path: /etc/resolv.conf
runcmd:
  - [nmcli, connection, reload]
  - [systemctl, mask, cloud-init-local, cloud-init, cloud-config, cloud-final]
  - [eject]
